title: mremoteng crashing in startup (The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception)
author: craphaelhoc
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
mremoteng crashing on start up

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
Application: mRemoteNG.exe
Framework Version: v4.0.30319
Description: The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception.
Exception Info: System.Xml.XmlException
   at System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl.Throw(System.Exception)
   at System.Xml.XmlTextReaderImpl.Throw(System.String, System.String[])
   ...

comments.snippet: i also have this issue with Windows 10 Ent 22H2 (19045.2251)
comments.author: dernerl

comments.snippet:
@dernerl Is it a permanent error? Would you mind trying with a clean config? 

To remove the config please Back Up the following two folders and then remove the files in that location: 

- *%APPDATA%\mRemoteNG*
- *%LOCALAPPDATA%\mRemoteNG*

If it then starts properly, you have an issue with the configuration file. You may the edit the backed up version with the text editor and try to fix it.
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet: Oh and to follow up: What version of mRemoteNG are you using?
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet: Deleting the config helped. Thanks! The installed version is 1.76.20.23615
